DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness of the íSi, Yo Puedo Controlar Mi Diabetes! (Yo Puedo) diabetes self-management education program.
DOC.brief_title: ¡Si, Yo Puedo Control Mi Diabetes!: A Diabetes Self-management Education Program for Hispanic/Latinos
DOC.criteria: Selfidentification as Hispanic/Latino, over the age of 18 years of age, diagnosis of type 2 diabetes and willingness to participate in the diabetes selfmanagement education class. nondiabetic persons, non Englishspeaking Hispanic/Latinos with type 2 diabetes
